column3: quality. Very special. Sashimi for 2 is always super fresh and offers an amazing selection and value as well. Coin toss with MF sushi for my fav sushi restaurant in houston
column4: but kata offers more 'flexibility' (hours) and a bit better value. Wonderful and attentive wait staff. There is a reason they stay busy all the time and the place well deserves it. Also very glad to see some management changes/improvements. Keep up the good work.
